titleStmt.title: A benedicitie or blessinge to be saide ouer the table before meate, and a grace or thankesgeeuinge, to be saide after meate
titleStmt.author: Niclaes, Hendrik, 1502?-1580?

notesStmt.note: At foot of title page: Translated out of Base-almaine into English. Anno. 1575.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
